testimonial.title: + Happy Customers
testimonial.subtitle: Testimonials
testimonial.description: For customers it'll get rid of that awkward post-meal but pre-departure time, a sometimes-20-minute period that Newsweek recently called 'a national crisis and disgrace.'

review.description: On Monday, Bee demonstrated self-awareness about her own talk-show fury, having Beck on to, essentially, give a testimonial about the hazards of polarized political broadcasting.
review.name: Sachin Diwar
review.title: CEO/Founder

review.description: But as Henry’s staged testimonial suggests, it can also bring confusion as the patient attempts to make sense of the disjuncture between a song heard right now and a recollection have heard the song before.
